question: Where is the Trakai city located in Lithuania?
true_answer: Trakai is located 30 km west of the center of Vilnius, in Vilnius County.
asked_question_translated: Gdzie znajduje się miasto Trakai na Litwie?
answer: Miasto Trakai znajduje się na Litwie, około 28 kilometrów na zachód od stolicy kraju, Wilna.
answer_translated_eng: The city of Trakai is located in Lithuania, some 28 kilometres west of the capital Vilnius.
